website_summaries.verdict: Facebook fanatics -- and, weirdly, Android purists -- looking for a functional Android phone will enjoy the HTC First. Everyone else can move along.
pros: As Facebook Home's debut handset, the HTC First delivers the social network's complete Android skin experience, along with Android 4.1 functionality at an affordable price
Android purists seeking a stock OS can get it by disabling Facebook Home
cons: Without Facebook Home, the First is a forgettable handset, from midrange camera hardware to its utilitarian design
It lacks a removable battery and microSD slot

customer_reviews.title: Just too slow to handle it's JellyBean OS and modern apps
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the size and design of this phone (after stripped of Facebook Home), and have used one for 2 years, but the processing and memory specs just can't handle it's JellyBean OS and modern apps. If you can figure out how to upgrade it to KitKat (I couldn't) it would be much better, as KitKat seems better designed for inferior phones. Android phone makers: please keep making phones this size!
customer_reviews.author: Westovers

customer_reviews.title: get it
customer_reviews.text: Its a okay phone, not the best nor worst. Camera is okay,5.0 megapixel and idk the front lol but itsgood. I turned off Facebook home cuz i did not like it and chose stock android. If your looking for a good phone that works and is reliable get this and you can't beat the price. Speaker is loud also
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great price and arrived within two days once ordered
customer_reviews.text: Great price and arrived within two days once ordered. My son loves his HTC First and would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: y4226

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone work better then my first on an whole a lot faster.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gainey

customer_reviews.title: Great item except
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone sleek design and performance except the battery keeps running low for some reason
customer_reviews.author: Nathroy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value but screen does not seem very scratch resistant
customer_reviews.text: Phone is pretty good with great specs and performance (may not be able to upgrade to Kitkat). Worked right away on T-mobile after I got a micro sim from a t-mobile retail store though it is connecting only on HSPA+ (and not LTE) though another phone we have at home (Moto G/LTE) connects to LTE most of the times. Only compliant is that the glass seems to scratch easily. Barely after a couple of weeks I have a few visible scratches - not sure if it is due to keys in the pocket or sand. Never had this issue with my older HTC G2 phone which I had for several years.
customer_reviews.author: KumarG

customer_reviews.title: My favorite color - works well!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have an HTC First when it first came out, four years later my screen cracked and was no use. So i bought this because I loved my phone and didn't really want to get a new style or different type of phone. I love this. My only issue is it occasionally shuts off randomly, but that is something I started to experience with my old phone recently so that is not something new. Glad this condition of the phone was pretty well kept! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Fast navigation. Enough memory even though no SD card slot. Camera quality not great but okay. CON: Have some trouble to switch from WiFi to 4G network sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: P.G.

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace the one I broke
customer_reviews.text: AT&T sent me a !!! FREE !!! phone and I dropped it before I even before I was able to activate it. Actually we aren't the "Jones" we only upgrade when we have to. My wife really hated our last phone " Pantec Pursuit". So we got the HTC First "The Facebook Phone" and we do really like it. Anyway I had to replace it so we found a good price on Amazon and purchased this one. Yes I would recommend this phone. I do wish we could add memory but not a chance, another AT&T Wham-Oh.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Addy

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: GOOD PRODUCT, IN GREAT CONDITION. COULD BE A LITTLE LESS EXPENSIVE BUT ITS GOOD, ENJOYED PLAYING WITH THE FEATURES. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Raywell

customer_reviews.title: phone was cracked, I could see inside the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: phone was cracked, I could see inside the phone come on now. about to return it back and get another come on now
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it.
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is an okay phone, but the phone I was sent was so crappy that I had to send it back. The microphone didn't work, it was dirty and scratched, it was slow, and it felt like they just reset the phone and put in the box, not like they refurbished it. When you refurbish a product, youre supposed to make sure that all the components work. Yes I couldn't talk on the phone because the microphone was broken. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Monse P.

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service ever <3
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with my phone because it didn't work when it came. So, I contacted the seller and he personally helped me with everything. He oriented me to contact HTC for them to repair my phone (since it comes with warranty) since that was not the seller's fault. I sent my phone to htc and the shipped it back in only 5 days! :) My phone is working now perfectly and I am loving it <3
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: i got this phone and it began to give problems ...
customer_reviews.text: i got this phone and it began to give problems just after 2 weeks of use, for some reason its turning off itself and when i attempt to power it back on it would began to flicker and automatically power off on its own.
customer_reviews.author: EastShop

customer_reviews.title: good.. but it came with a broken in ...
customer_reviews.text: good .. but it came with a broken in one of the screen edges
customer_reviews.author: Jose H Roman

customer_reviews.title: The Best Phone Ever
customer_reviews.text: The best phone ever .. it looks awsome and it can run modern games like (Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas) so I recommend this phone for you !
customer_reviews.author: Saleh Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Good device. But my only problems are that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good device. But my only problems are that the ability to set ring tone, use sd card, set own wall paper, and hear calls well because microphone sits on the bottom of phone exists.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. The first one worked fine for a year, but unexpectedly stopped working after 5 minutes underwater pool adventure in my pocket. You can't expect it to work after that, can you? Actually, it worked, but I burned a charging circuit by plugging it in before it was completely dry. So I went and bought another one. I like its size, power, battery, almost everything. Just disable Facebook Home right from the beginning and you'll get almost pure Android for the fraction of the price of big rivals. I could be easily be rooted as well, but I didn't bother with my second one.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Twas a good first phone
customer_reviews.text: Twas a good first phone, but after I dropped it (which cracked the screen, and most likely damaged internal component), its performance degraded a little. My mom's still works decent and shes had it for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great it also looks like an iPhone when u have a case on it I love this phone
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: fine to me (:
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome I received it a day early,came with its original box and charger!
customer_reviews.author: khamsing

customer_reviews.title: crappy!
customer_reviews.text: this phone is crappy just like that phone myspace had.
customer_reviews.author: Chinasa

customer_reviews.title: reliable phone, used for 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for 2 years. It began to lag, so I decided to by a BLU phone. I'm afraid to say that it wasn't the best decision (it lags a lot, and its brand knew!), and I'll hopefully buy the htc first again someday. Not at all a bad price for it. I loved it for its small and slim design, its high quality feel, and the large amount of additional space. However, I would have appreciated an android update. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joselyn

product_meta.title: HTC First 16GB Unlocked GSM Android Cell Phone - Black
product_meta.description:
Keep up with all your friends in real time with the new HTC First, featuring Facebook Home. See a steady stream of photos and posts from friends on a home screen that refreshes automatically. You will never miss a moment with upfront notifications about events, calls and Facebook updates. Messages feature your friends profile pictures and you can chat while using other apps. Access your favorite apps and post right to Facebook on the customizable app launcher. With the HTC First, you'll always stay connected to your friends.

feature_bullets: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.
